name: Wilderness Generation
content:
The Solo Adventurer’s Toolbox

 

RANDOM WILDERNESS GENERATION

 

This system is useful for quest-based play and wilderness-based quests, where your PC or PCs are travelling across wilderness to explore a certain area, perhaps following up on rumors about activity in that area. Similar to how you might randomly generate a dungeon with the Random Dungeon Generation tools, the system contained here generates random terrain and wilderness features. This system can be used whenever you are adventuring through and exploring wilderness without knowing exactly what is within that territory.
